name: Paranoia (itch) (Archimagus)
description:
In a world of darkness with only the sound of your heartbeat as company.  Are you brave enough to find all the survivors?

Explore the dark maze of a world to try and find all 21 survivors and bring them back to the only light in the world.  

Your sanity can be judged by the speed of your heartbeat.  If you are away from the light for too long, you lose. 

The more survivors you rescue, the braver you become, letting you explore further from the light.  If you are brave enough.

Created for the Global Game Jam 2013. Theme, the sound of a heartbeat.
